name: Portable Power Saw
description:
When the character to which this is attached takes DMG: If possible, Discard 1 card from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice cost to negate 1 DMG, and then gain 1 Stoic's Symbol point. (Once per Round)
When the character deals DMG: If there are Stoic's Symbol points already, consume all points and increase DMG dealt this instance by 1, then draw 1 card for each point consumed.
